text: Clarence Charles "Ducky" Nash (December 7, 1904 â€“ February 20, 1985) was an American voice actor. He was the voice for Disney cartoon character Donald Duck for almost 50 years. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1934 The Wise Little Hen Donald Duck, Peter Pig (voice, uncredited) The Flying
